pullRequest.title: Add the rest of the fields to UserResourceBean.
pullRequest.bodyText: Minor indentation fix on UserResourceBean.Type enum.

commit.message: Add the rest of the fields to UserResourceBean.

nodes.bodyText: I think the current app assumes it to be "resources" (and "report").
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -19,13 +21,25 @@
 @Getter
 public class UserResourceBean {
   public enum Type {
-	  @JsonProperty("report")
-	  PERSONALIZED_REPORT,
-	  @JsonProperty("resource")
-	  INSTITUTION_RESOURCE
+    @JsonProperty("report")
+    PERSONALIZED_REPORT,
+    @JsonProperty("resource")

nodes.bodyText: We might need to set this field to different integers in the response. It seems that at least the iOS app cares about the presence of this field.
I'm not sure if this field matters on app but we might need to set it to "All".

commit.message: Change string representation of user resources to "resources".
